chunk:
PCA Skin Makeup Removing Wipes

Brand: PCA Skin

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Water, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Polysorbate 20, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Glycerin, Lauryl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ceteareth-12, Cetyl Palmitate

-12, Cetyl Palmitate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
